title.rendered: All Nippon Airways Hand | Cabin Baggage

content.rendered:
One piece of baggage not more than 10 kg(22 lb) and dimensions 55 cm × 40 cm × 25 cm

For more details visit : https://www.All Nippon Airways.com .lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

All Nippon Airways Checked Baggage

All Nippon Airways Excess Baggage
